Trade/Device Name(s): Buprenorphine Enzyme Immunoassay and Norbuprenorphine Calibrators and Controls
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter UniCel DxC automated clinical system analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Buprenorphine Enzyme Immunoassay and Norbuprenorphine Calibrators and Controls for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of norbuprenorphine in urine using Beckman Coulter analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of norbuprenorphine (buprenorphine metabolite) in human urine at a 10 ng/mL cutoff, used with Beckman Coulter Synchron LX, CX, and UniCel DxC analyzers; calibrators and controls are for calibration and quality monitoring with these platforms.
